task.summary: Added refConditions support to implementation & tests.
Updated to allow conditions to be applied to array of ObjectIDs.

Explicit validation passes with null value (no nulls should be handled using "required" validation).
Tidied up to use mongoose.model.
Bumped version for release again.

Added fix for issue #3 where explicit null value for an array of IDs causes error.
Added integration tests.
Added test placeholder for issue #1. To be amended to reproduce problem.

Adding fix for issue #3. This was caused by mongoose-id-validator referring to its own local copy of the mongoose module instead of the application module.
Made mongoose a dev dependency so tests work.
Updated readme and bumped version for release.
Adding test coverage for recursion into sub-schemas. Tidied up function slightly

Adding functionality to allow duplicate entries when validating an array of ID values (GitHub issue #12).
Bumped version for release

Updated schema validate call to use object and added isAsync flag.
Fixes issue #17.
Fixed test failing with mongoose 4.9.3. Changed to be more verbose but easier to understand as test code should be as simple as possible.

Updated recursion code to prevent validating sub-schema when implementing self recursive schemas.
This fixes #19.

This fixes #19.
